title: Sugar beet production in the U.S. 2000 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Production in thousand tons. In total the number of data points it has is 20.
Overall Production in thousand tons has decreased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2000 and 2001.
The highest Production in thousand tons, of value 36920.0 was reached at Year 2016
Minimum Production in thousand tons about 25708.0 was reached at Year 2001
